title: 1vX
rules: Only one player is active at a time.
Inactive players are not allowed to move, shoot, use cams etc.

rules.value: Inactive players wait their turn outside.
Inactive players will find a hiding spot and wait their turn there.

title: Advent Calendar
rules: Everyone picks a window or door and spawnpeeks.

title: Alternate Arms
rules: Pick a random operator.
Equip a different main gun.
Equip a different secondary gun.
Equip a different secondary gadget.

title: Big Brother
rules: Bring 2 operators with bulletproof cameras.
Place all your cameras on site.
Hide on the other side of the building and watch the enemy on cams.
Red ping the enemy all the time.

title: Blackout
rules: Don't bring any electric gadgets.

rules.value: Keep your drones at spawn and immediately shoot them when the action phase starts.
As soon as you see anything electrical, shoot or EMP it and say "Focking laser sights."
Shoot all default cameras during prep phase.

title: Boomstick
description: A deadly squad. Unless they're more than 5 meters away.
rules: Only use shotguns.
If possible, bring secondary shotguns as well.

title: Bravo Six, going dark!
description: Hope you brought night vision goggles.
rules: Set your in-game brightness to 10.

title: Doktor's Curse
rules: No guns allowed.
Make your traps and knives count.

title: G2 vs TT9
description: "They can only drone us if we move!" -Alemao, probably
rules: Don't move during preparation phase. No walking, no turning, no reinforcing, no shooting drones.

title: Grounded
rules: You are not allowed to rappel, vault or climb ladders.

title: Hot Breach
description: E3 2014 called. It wants its Siege trailer back.
rules: Everyone brings breach charges.
Everyone picks a window and hot-breaches into the building at the same time.

title: Hot Drop Retake
rules: Wait on a hatch above site until the objective is being taken or defused.
As soon as the objective is being taken or defused, hot-drop the hatch and retake site.

title: Hurr!
rules: You may only communicate with Minecraft villager noises.

title: Iron Sights only
description: What do you mean you can't see?
rules: Unequip any sights on your guns.

title: King's Guard

rules.value: Survive.

rules: Protect Tachanka at all costs.
If Tachanka dies, the rest commits sudoku or surrenders themselves to the enemy.

title: Lucky Luke
rules: Only use handguns.
Machine pistols and secondary shotguns are disallowed.
Bonus points for Deagle and Revolver only.

title: Might need this later
description: When did I get 250 health potions?
rules: Bring a lot of utility.
Don't utilize it.

title: No backing off!
rules: As soon as Action Phase starts, you hold W.
Don't let go of W until you win or die.

rules.value: Everyone picks the same loadout.
Everyone picks the same loadout.

title: One in the Chamber
rules: You may only shoot at enemies with one bullet in the chamber.
Use reload cancel to empty your magazines.
Shotguns are disallowed.

title: One in the Chamber (extreme)
rules: You may only shoot at enemies with one bullet in the chamber.
Use reload cancel to empty your magazines.
You may only bring LMGs.
Secondary guns are disallowed.

title: Pacifist
description: No defenders were hurt during the production of this round.
rules: Win the round without hurting any enemies.
Don't bring any lethal gadgets.
Non-lethal gadgets are allowed (Airjab, EMP, Candela, Stun Grenades etc).

title: Parkour
rules: You are not allowed to take stairs.
You can only change floors by rappelling or hatch dropping.

rules.value: Immediately attach your shields when you don't have one on your gun.
If you run out of shields, you have to play behind one of your teammates.
Make sure to bring your shield.
When moving you must hold a shield in front of your face.
To shoot, you must place your shield down first and shoot from behind it.
If you run out of shields, you have to play behind one of your teammates.

title: Polygot
rules: Everyone must speak in a different language.

title: Privacy, Please!

rules.value: Use your pests to prevent drones from entering.
Immediately shoot captured drones.
Use your jammers to prevent drones from entering.

rules: Reinforce every outside wall of site.
Reinforce every door and window you pass.
Don't create sightlines.
Shoot every default camera.
Don't bring cameras.

title: Red Light, Green Light
description: Really takes the "and" out of "Run and Gun".
rules: You may not shoot and move at the same time.

title: Rooted
rules: Pick your spot. As soon as Action Phase starts, you are not allowed to move away.

title: Rush B
rules: Rush B

rules.value: Place your Armor Plates outside the building for the attackers to take.
Place your Kona Stations outside the building for the attackers to use.

title: Slow and Steady
rules: You can only move by Alt-walking.

title: Sniper Squad
rules: Bring DMRs with 3x scopes.
Only use primary guns.

title: The Solo Queue Experience™
rules: No communication allowed. Mute yourself in-game and in Discord / TeamSpeak.

title: Speedrun
rules: Bring only 3 speed operators.
Take the most direct route to site.
No roam clearing.

title: Spinbot
description: We don't have better aim, we have MORE aim!
rules: Set either your in-game mouse sensitivity to 100 or your mouse DPI to the maximum.

title: Splinter Cell
rules: Only use silenced handguns.
Machine pistols and secondary shotguns are disallowed.

rules.value: Everyone follows Zero's lead.
Call them.
Bee them.
Track them.
Scan them.
Ping them.

title: Supressive Fire
description: LMG mounted. And loaded. And unloaded. On everything.
rules: Bring only LMGs.
As soon as you start shooting, you cannot stop until your magazine is empty.

title: Swiss Cheese
rules: Make as many punch holes in reinforcable walls as possible.
Only shoot at people through punch holes.

title: Switcheroo
description: The room is safe! What do you mean they planted?
rules: Completely reinforce a different site on the map.
The other site can't share a room with the actual site (e.g. Kitchen / Dining and Kitchen / Meeting on Oregon).

title: The Floor is Lava
rules: As soon as Action Phase starts, you may only shoot from elevated positions.
You may only touch the lava to sprint directly to a new high ground.

title: The Snake
rules: Inside the building, you are only allowed to move while prone.
You may stand up to shoot, but need to go prone again to continue moving.

title: Welcome!
rules: You may not reinforce any walls or barricade any doors.
Fully open every reinforcable wall on and between sites.

title: Wet Work
rules: You are only allowed to enter and exit the building through bathrooms.

title: Year 1 Turtle
description: Site is Home. Site is Safe Space.
rules: Bring only Pathfinder operators.
Reinforce every wall, door and window of site.
Sit in site for the entire round.
Pray they don't bring Fuze.
